content: I'd like to try out Todoist's Focus Mode and see how it can help me stay concentrated. Since I have a morning yoga class at 7:00 AM on weekdays, I'd like to schedule my most important tasks during my most productive hours, which are usually between 8:30 AM and 12:00 PM. Can you show me how to schedule tasks in Todoist and set reminders for my most important tasks during this time frame?
